short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is developed for Dynamix's Solvr suite of applications. It captures content of your screen for collaboration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamixâ€™s Collaborate offers a fast and simple way to share your screen for online meetings, demos, and collaboration. Dynamix Collaborate makes it easy to share presentations, photos and documents during meetings or to share the screen real-time during a chat. We support sharing from Windows, Mac, iOS, Android, and any operating system that supports the Chrome and Firefox browser.
